item.title: GE Power Joins MomentumNow Stocks on Strong Financial Footing
item.description: GE Power, a small-cap player in the Heavy Electrical Equipment sector, has been added to the MomentumNow Stocks list as of 23 December 2025, reflecting its recent financial performance and alignment with momentum-driven investment strategies. Time: 11 minutes ago

item.title: D B Corp Forms Death Cross Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: D B Corp, a key player in the Media & Entertainment sector, has recently formed a Death Cross, a technical pattern where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development often signals a shift towards a bearish trend and suggests a weakening momentum in the stock’s price trajectory. Time: 1 hour ago
